success_message.theme_support:
**Thank you for getting in touch!**

We’re excited to review your submission and let’s see how we can best serve you. We will be in touch within 24 hours until then take care of yourself.

Have a great day!

theme_support_disclaimer.disclaimer_starting: **Please use the email address that you used to purchase the theme**. Our support team will be able to help you more quickly if you provide this information. Also, please keep in mind that our support:
not_included: Fixing issues that were caused by third-party apps or custom work
theme_support_disclaimer.disclaimer_ending: If you have specific requirements for your project that our theme doesn’t already include, you can check [our services](/custom-development) to make changes to your website.

policy_disclaimer: * Your data is safe with us. We take your privacy seriously and never share your data with anyone. To learn more read our [Privacy Policy](/privacy-policy).
